name: Sales Generation Active Program PSOF
query:
select 
`tabPSOF Program Bill`.psof as "PSOF:Link/PSOF:120", 
`tabPSOF Program Bill`.subscription_program as program,
`tabPSOF Program Bill`.date_from,
`tabPSOF Program Bill`.date_to
 from 
`tabPSOF Program Bill`
where 

active=1 and 

cast(`tabPSOF Program Bill`.date_from  as date) 
between 
(select start_date from `tabSubscription Period` where `tabSubscription Period`.name=%(period)s )
and 
(select end_date from `tabSubscription Period` where `tabSubscription Period`.name=%(period)s )

and
cast(`tabPSOF Program Bill`.date_to  as date) 
between 
(select start_date from `tabSubscription Period` where `tabSubscription Period`.name=%(period)s )
and 
(select end_date from `tabSubscription Period` where `tabSubscription Period`.name=%(period)s )

order by `tabPSOF Program Bill`.parent
